about_the_game:
"Precision strategy, real-time duels—command your AI squad in a relentless arena!"

About This Game

Circuit Stance is a competitive strategy game that blends creativity and tactical depth, designed for players who love to think, optimize, and win. Step into the role of a post-apocalyptic super AI, programming your robot squad to secure resources and dominate the battlefield.

  • Plan your strategy, program your destiny!
    Utilize the modular chip system to craft unique AI behaviors for your robots. Test, refine, and unleash the ultimate strategies in battle!

  • Fast iterations, tactical supremacy!
    Circuit Stance offers quick yet complex turn-based matches, letting you experience the full cycle of experimentation to mastery in minutes.

  • Only winners survive the arena!
    With a unique tiered scoring system, each victory propels your rank upward, while losses bring challenges. Every match counts!

  • Stylized flat anime aesthetics!
    Featuring sleek, futuristic designs and vibrant 2D visuals, Circuit Stance offers a seamless blend of strategy and style.

Who is this game for?

  • Players who thrive on deep strategy, optimization, and quick tactical challenges

  • Those who dislike time management and prefer jumping straight into the action

Features

  • Modular Tactical Programming: Design and deploy robot AI chip actions to create diverse tactical builds.

  • High-Risk, High-Reward Competitions: Push your ranking higher with each win or face the challenge of starting over.

  • Iterative Strategy Testing: Experiment, optimize, and validate your tactics in fast-paced matches.

  • Flat Anime Art Style: Lightweight but futuristic visuals make every duel visually dynamic and strategic.

Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 11 (Big Sur) or later
  • Processor: Any Intel or Apple Silicon processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
